content: Good life to all,As per title, I sell BTC AND ETH for any other crypto with a flat 5% COMMISSION in my favor.I can use localbitcoins or paxful or bitfinex OTC as escrow services.I am serious. To start I propose transacting maximum4/5.000$ and no less than $500.Regards

comments.author: mr.relax
comments.body: Who pays the fee? You or I?In Case "you", pls drop a PM
